entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
